用于附属设施建筑的四路小功率配电（SPN）配电箱（DB-UB），配有额定电流63安、额定剩余动作电流0.3安的剩余电流动作断路器（RCCB）进线开关，以及10安单极微型断路器（MCB）出线开关1个、20安微型断路器出线开关3个，品牌指定为梅兰日兰（MEM）、ABB或经认可的同等品牌 。

MAIN SUPPLY
主电源
Supply, install, test and commission the following, note that all cables should be supplied complete with lugs, glands and shroud.
供应、安装、测试并调试以下设备，请注意，所有电缆应随附完整的接线端子、电缆密封套和防护罩一并供应。

10 Ways Purpose made free standing Main LV  Panel Board with 800A TPN Air Circuit Breaker incomer ,metal clad,cubical pattern to IP65,with short circuit breaking capacity of 50kA at 415VAC,50Hz Comprising of Digital Metering  and outgoing MCCBs of 250A TP (1Nos),125A(2Nos),320A(2Nos) ,100A TP (2Nos),63A SP (1No) as shown in schematic drawing.
10套定制的独立式低压主配电板，配备800安培四极（TPN）空气断路器进线装置，金属外壳，采用符合IP65防护等级的柜式结构，在415伏交流、50赫兹条件下的短路分断能力为50千安。配电板包含数字计量装置，以及出线塑壳断路器，具体规格如下：250安培三极（TP）断路器1个、125安培断路器2个、320安培断路器2个、100安培三极（TP）断路器2个、63安培单极（SP）断路器1个，如原理图所示。
3(1C x 150mm2)Cu,PVC/SWA/PVC cable from  transformer and generator  to Main LV Panel Board through Changeover switch

12ways Sub Panel board SPB-1, IP 42, flush/surface Mounted, complete with the following ABB breakers: Main incomer: 1# MCCB 250A 3p  
Outgoers: 
3# MCCB 63A 
8# MCCB 63A SP
1# MCCB 100A

12ways Sub Panel board SPB-2, IP 42, flush/surface Mounted, complete with the following ABB breakers: Main incomer: 1# MCCB 250A 3p
Outgoers:
7# MCCB 100A  
3# MCCB 63A SP
2# MCCB 63A

1# MCCB 250A 3 Phase
Outgoers: 
3# MCCB 63A 3P
1# MCCB 150A 3P
2#MCCB 63A 1P

Outgoers:
3# MCCB 63A 3P
1# MCCB 150A 3P
2#MCCB 63A 1P
(1C x 150mm2) XLPE/SWA/PVC/Cu cable from  transformer and generator  to Main metering  Panel Board through changeover switch
4C x 95mm2 Cu,PVC/SWA/PVC cable from  MDB to  ground floor sub panel board SPB-1
4C x 95mm2 Cu,PVC/SWA/PVC cable from  MDB to  ground floor sub panel board SPB-3
4C x 95mm2 Cu,PVC/SWA/PVC cable from  MDB to Fourth floor sub panel board SPB-4
4C x 150mm2 Cu,PVC/SWA/PVC cable from  MDB to Fourth floor sub panel board SPB-2
1C x 50mm2  Cu,PVC  Green/Yellow earth cable.
100mm diameter heavy gauge PVC Pipe
Allow for complete earthing of the Electrical System to IEE standards.
需按照英国电气工程师学会（IEE）标准对电气系统进行完整接地。
Allow for testing and commissioning of the entire Installation
需考虑对整个装置进行测试和调试。
Allow preparation of four copies of " Installed Drawings" and operating manuals.
需准备四份“安装图纸”以及操作手册。
800A TPN automatic changeover switch comprising of two 4-pole electrically and mechanically interlocked 800A motorised MCCB complete with controller
800安培四极（TPN）自动转换开关，由两个4极电动且机械互锁的800安培电动塑壳断路器（MCCB）组成，并配有控制器。
Supply and install the 500kVA,33/0.4kV transformer and all associated accessories
供应并安装500千伏安、33/0.4千伏的变压器以及所有相关附件。
Supply and installation of control cable for generator automatic operation 2.5mm2 x 12core
供应并安装用于发电机自动运行的控制电缆，规格为2.5平方毫米×12芯 。
Supply and installation of copper earth 4ft rod,earth rod connector and cable lugs for 35sqmm cable
供应并安装4英尺长的铜接地棒、接地棒连接器以及适配35平方毫米电缆的电缆接线端子。
